meanings.definition: Inclined to yawn or feeling the need to yawn.
meanings.sent1: After a long day, I feel so yawny and tired.
meanings.sent2: The boring lecture made everyone in the room yawny.
meanings.sent3: The movie was so yawny that even the actors seemed bored.
meanings.sent4: The repetitive music had a yawny effect on the audience.
meanings.sent5: The monotonous voice of the speaker was incredibly yawny.

meanings.sent1: The yawny music in the elevator made me sleepy.
meanings.sent2: The yawny atmosphere of the room made everyone drowsy.
meanings.sent3: The yawny movie had people yawning before it even started.
meanings.sent4: The yawny presentation put the entire audience to sleep.
meanings.sent5: The yawny book had a hypnotic effect on the readers.
